name: Shira Dentz
bio: Shira Dentz is the author of five full-length collections: black seeds on a white dish (Shearsman Books, 2010), door of thin skins (CavanKerry Press, 2013), how do i net thee (Salmon Poetry, 2018), the sun a blazing zero (Lavender Ink/Diálogos, 2019), and Sisyphusina (PANK, 2020). She lives and teaches in upstate New York.
